ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreather pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: For me personally, I will sell any rebreather that I happen to be carrying for 2K (to someone I dont know).  If it is a friend that needs it, I prefer to have
ygData.messageBody:
For me personally, I will sell any rebreather that I happen to be carrying
for 2K (to someone I dont know). If it is a friend that needs it, I prefer
to have them fund my attempts, they simply pay the cost of the components
for each attempt until I have for them a rebreather...sometimes they gets
one cheap, sometimes it gets expensive...

Cogg - RZ

----- Original Message -----
From: "Madgrizzle" <MadGrizzle@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 02, 2000 2:30 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreather pricing


> Well, I found the only person that called me a f*****ng idiot for selling
> rebreathers for 2kpp. He said it only cost 1kpp per attempt and I should
> charge near that. What a moron, I told him to piss off.
>
>
>
>
>
